label: Hernández-Mena, David I., Christina Lynggaard, Berenit Mendoza-Garfias & Gerardo Perez-Ponce de Leon.  2016. A new species of Auriculostoma (Trematoda: Allocreadiidae) from the intestine  of Brycon guatemalensis (Characiformes: Bryconidae) from the Usumacinta River Basin, Mexico, based on morphology and 28S rDNA sequences,  with a key to species of the genus. Zootaxa 4196(2): 261–277.
